name: TestsForCarbapenemaseResistanceMechanism
title: Tests for carbapenemase resistance mechanism
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting carbapenemase resistance mechanisms),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: carbapenemase resistance mechanism),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
